data.eml:eml: Notocrater christofferseni n. sp. (Vetigastropoda: Pseudococculinidae): first record of the genus in the South Atlantic Ocean

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lima, Silvio Felipe Barbosa (2014): Notocrater christofferseni n. sp. (Vetigastropoda: Pseudococculinidae): first record of the genus in the South Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 3873 (2): 178-186, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3873.2.5
